price: Saa ara na wo Wura Nyankopɔn asotwee no teε, sε Ɔretwe nkuro bi a wɔdi bɔne no aso a, nokorε sε N’asotwee a Ɔde twe wɔn no yεya, na ano nso yε den papaapa.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika akhdhu rabbika idhā akhadha al-qurā wahiya ẓālimatun inna akhdhahu alīmun shadīdun
